I have spoken to 3 agents since. Each promised to rectify the problem for me. Today when I checked my account, it is still showing 7GB. I did not know re-contracting with SIngtel is so difficult. Each time I called, I have to go through all the verification and explained the issue. It is a pure waste of my time. I will terminate the account if this issue is still not rectified by Wed (exactly a week) and don't you dare to charge me for early termination!
